CustomField.description: Integrated with NetSuite. Required in SpringCM; used to indicate whether there are Performance Guarantees. If so, users will be required to populate the PG fields.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used to indicate whether there are Performance Guarantees. If so, users will be required to populate the PG fields.- - Edits Controlled - Financially Material
CustomField.label: Performance Guarantees?
